attributes.action: Add "I do not want any of these people to represent me" to voting forms
attributes.additional_details:
As someone who is totally commited to the democratic process and grateful for the many, many people who fought hard so that I have the right to vote, I am beginning to panic about the next election.

I am an ethical, moral, compassionate person and I can't bring myself to vote for any of the current political parties.  Not voting is not an option.

I would like a box to be added to all voting forms saying "I do not want any of these parties to represent me".  Perhaps if the majority of the British people actively say that we do not want these people to be making the decisions for how our country is run then they might actually listen to us and not only those with large bank balances.
